title: Pizza Master Class
description: Full hands-on course for pizza chef, attendance mandatory. Starting with the basic mixes, you will learn and master the rising, maturation, topping and baking techniques, while using the best state-of-the-art equipment.

title: Lasagna Cooking Class
description: Learn how to make Traditional Italian Lasagna from scratch.

title: Coctails Master Class
description: Course has been designed so that you can perfect the art of mixing cocktails. This course will educate you about the history of the cocktail, equipment used to mix and serve cocktails, techniques and how to create a wide selection of classic non-alcoholic and alcoholic drinks.

title: Shots Master Class
description: Course has been designed so that you can perfect the art of mixing all kind of shots. This course will educate you techniques and how to create a wide selection of classic non-alcoholic and alcoholic shots.

title: Cookies Master Class
description: In this course, you will learn how to recapture the spirit of the perfect cookie, how to make them from scratch, and how to share them with family and friends for years to come.

title: Baking and Pastry Master Class
description: Baking and Pastry focuses on weights, measures, formulas and general baking classifications, handling and storage of ingredients, safety and handling, production of yeast raised dough products, cakes, cookies, batters, breads, biscuits, muffins, pies, and special dessert preparation.

title: Pancakes Master Class
description: Learn the true art of pancake-making with our Pancake-Making Training Workshop.

title: Eggs Master Class
description: Learn the ins and outs of preparing eggs including a basic scramble, hard-cooked, poached, and fried.

title: Burger Master Class
description: Learn everything about cooking your own burgers from scratch: buns, patties, sauces, toppings.

title: Stake Master Class
description: This hands-on class teaches you the practical knowledge and skills required to cook a steakhouse-quality meal at home.

title: Ice Cream Master Class
description: Learn everything about cooking your own burgers from scratch: buns, patties, sauces, toppings.

title: Dessert Magic Class
description: Learn cooking techniques for making ravenous desserts that can be served at dinner parties or for relishing at home with your family.

title: Tango Dancing Lessons
description: Learn a foundation of moves and dance with passion to a soundtrack packed with authentic tango rhythms.

title: DJ Master Class
description: Learn how to mix on vinyl and digital using DJ stations.

title: Souvlaki Cooking Class
description: Learn how to grill the skewers, chop the veggies, make the ultimate tzatziki and finally how to wrap it.

title: Greek Seafood Cooking Class
description: learn how to prepare Greek seafood that you would expect to find in a Greek family home.
